credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Yoko Ono, A Celebration of Being Human
description: Black and white image of someone's nude posterior and upper thighs. Text across bottom in black and grey reads: "A Celebration of being Human/ We are beautiful. We are fun. We are mammals without tails. y.o./ Langenhagen '94." Text in black vertically oriented up right side in top corner reads "Yoko Ono 1994."
name: Poster
